meta.title: WallpaperAI - Endless AI-Generated Wallpapers
meta.description: Transform your desktop daily with stunning AI-generated wallpapers. Thousands of categories, infinite possibilities. Free and ad-free forever.

hero.title: Transform Your Desktop with AI Magic
hero.subtitle: Stunning wallpapers generated by artificial intelligence, changing every day
hero.description: Experience the future of desktop personalization with WallpaperAI. Get fresh, breathtaking wallpapers automatically - from photorealistic landscapes to futuristic worlds.

feature1.title: Infinite Variety
feature1.description: Powered by cutting-edge AI, enjoy an endless stream of unique wallpapers. From hyper-realistic photography to imaginative art, futuristic scenes to classic paintings - there's something for everyone.

feature2.title: Automatic Daily Updates
feature2.description: Wake up to a fresh desktop every morning. Configure WallpaperAI to change your wallpaper daily, hourly, or at custom intervals. Never see the same background twice.

feature3.title: Hundreds of Categories
feature3.description: Choose from diverse categories: nature, space, architecture, animals, fantasy, sci-fi, and more. New categories added regularly to keep your desktop exciting.

feature4.title: Multi-Monitor Support
feature4.description: Perfect for multi-screen setups. Display different wallpapers on each monitor or create stunning panoramas across your entire workspace.

feature5.title: Completely Free
feature5.description: No hidden costs, no subscriptions, no ads. WallpaperAI is 100% free and always will be. Beautiful wallpapers for everyone, forever.

feature6.title: Lightweight & Fast
feature6.description: Minimal system resources, maximum visual impact. WallpaperAI runs quietly in the background, ready whenever you need a fresh look.

categories.title: Explore Our Categories
categories.subtitle: Discover thousands of AI-generated wallpapers across diverse themes

download.title: Ready to Transform Your Desktop?
download.subtitle: Join thousands of users enjoying fresh wallpapers every day
